item.description:
Meetup member and Portland Slow Riders founder Julie Fitzgerald will host the Bicycle Meetup December Party at her house, where we will feature munchies, hot drinks (BYOB), prizes, and our annual discussion of How to Ride All Winter. Your contribution of food or drink is welcome but not required. The party will start at 3 PM and go until 6 PM.

Please bring your winter gear for show and tell! Discussion will probably start at around 4 PM, and center around clothing, lights, and tires.

There will be prizes donated by Ernie's Cycle Shop (Westbrook) and by the Meetup for:

  • Most attractive winter lighting,
  • "Studliest tires",
  • Most winter gear brought for show and tell,
  • Person traveling furthest to the event by bike,
  • Youngest person traveling by bike,
  • Oldest person traveling by bike,
  • Whatever other categories occur to us!


Prizes will be awarded later in the evening, maybe around 5 or 5:30.

Families and significant others are encouraged.

Stop on by and talk bike talk with your friends in the Portland Bicycle Commuting Meetup.
item.name: December Party / How to Ride All Winter
